changeEmailDescription: To change current account E-mail you must first verify that you own the current address and then confirm the new one.
changeUsernameDescription: You can change your nickname to any arbitrary value. Remember that it is not recommended to take a nickname of already existing Mojang account.
changeUsernameWarning: Be careful: if you playing on the server with nickname binding, then after changing nickname you may lose all your progress.
components.auth.activation.activationMai: Please check {email} for the message with the last registration step
components.auth.activation.enterTheCode: Enter the code from E-mail here
components.auth.changePassword.changePas: To enhance the security of your account, please change your password.
components.auth.finish.passCodeToApp: To complete authorization process, please, provide the following code to {appName}
components.auth.finish.waitAppReaction: Please, wait till your application response
components.auth.forgotPassword.pleasePre: Please press the button bellow to get an email with password recovery code.
components.auth.forgotPassword.specifyEm: Specify the registration E-mail address or last used username for your account and we will send an email with instructions for further password recovery.
components.auth.forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
components.auth.permissions.scope_offlin: Access to your profile data, when you offline
components.auth.recoverPassword.enterCod: Please enter the code received into the field below:
components.auth.recoverPassword.enterNew: Enter and repeat new password below:
components.auth.recoverPassword.messageW: The recovery code was sent to your account email.
The recovery code was sent to your email {email}.
components.auth.recoverPassword.title: Restore password
components.profile.accountDescription: Ely.by account allows you to get access to many Minecraft resources. Please, take care of your account safety. Use secure password and change it regularly.
components.profile.changePassword.achiev: Are you cherish your game achievements, right?
components.profile.changePassword.change: Please take a password, that will be different from your passwords on the other sites and will not be the same you are using to enter Minecraft game servers you are playing.
components.profile.changePassword.passwo: Password must contain at least 8 characters. It can be any symbols â€” do not limit yourself, create an unpredictable password!
components.profile.mojangPriorityWarning: A Mojang account with the same nickname was found. According to project rules, account owner has the right to demand the restoration of control over nickname.
components.profile.oldHashingAlgoWarning:
Your was hashed with an old hashing algorithm.
Please, change password.
components.profile.preferencesDescriptio: Here you can change the key preferences of your account. Please note that all actions must be confirmed by entering a password.
enterFinalizationCode: The E-mail change confirmation code was sent to {email}. Please enter the code received into the field below:
enterInitializationCode: The E-mail with an initialization code for E-mail change procedure was sent to {email}. Please enter the code into the field below:
enterNewEmail: Then provide your new E-mail address, that you want to use with this account. You will be mailed with confirmation code.
pressButtonToStart: Press the button below to send a message with the code for E-mail change initialization.
services.emailFrequency: Please cool down, you are requesting emails too often. New key can be retrieved after 30 minutes from the previous request.
services.emailIsTempmail: Tempmail E-mail addresses is not allowed
services.invalidPassword: You have entered wrong account password.
services.loginNotExist: Sorry, Ely doesn't recognise your login.
services.passwordTooShort: Your password should be at least 8 characters length
services.rulesAgreementRequired: You must accept rules in order to create an account
title: Confirm your action
